original_text: May the Lord destroy that man, as he completely destroyed those cities long ago. 20: ‘Those cities’ were probably Sodom and Gomorrah that God destroyed. See Genesis 19:24. I want that man to hear people who are weeping in the morning. I want him to hear the noise of battles at noon. May the Lord destroy that man,
korean_text: 그 사람은 여호와께서 무너뜨리시고 후회하지 아니하신 성읍 같이 되었더면, 그가 아침에는 부르짖는 소리, 낮에는 떠드는 소리를 듣게 하였더면, 좋을 뻔하였나니
